2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

A clear and concise description of what actually happened.

**Backend:**
- OS: [e.g. Ubuntu 20.04]

- Cluster type: [e.g. minikube, EKS, GKE]
- kubectl version: [e.g. v1.22.0]
